analysis.description:
GladiatorBattle._payForBet (/unique_chucks/41/0xc0fc330729cd77e6c403da011ef52aac7b00b7d2.sol#238-253) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- address(_storage_).transfer(_value) (/unique_chucks/41/0xc0fc330729cd77e6c403da011ef52aac7b00b7d2.sol#249-250)
GladiatorBattle.apply (function @ /unique_chucks/41/0xc0fc330729cd77e6c403da011ef52aac7b00b7d2.sol#428-461) shadows built-in symbol "apply"

GladiatorBattle.AUTO_SELECT_TIME should be constant (/unique_chucks/41/0xc0fc330729cd77e6c403da011ef52aac7b00b7d2.sol#228)
GladiatorBattle.INTERVAL_FOR_NEW_BLOCK should be constant (/unique_chucks/41/0xc0fc330729cd77e6c403da011ef52aac7b00b7d2.sol#231-232)
